q_ch: 对于编号为34的缝纫任务，所有的工作量我都已完成，请更新已完成数量。
q_en: I have completed all the workload for the sewing task with ID 34. Please update the completed quantity.
gt:
### Task Update Confirmation

Hey there! 😄 Great job on completing all the workload for the sewing task with ID 34! Here's a quick summary of the update:

| Task ID | Planned Quantity | Completed Quantity Update Status |
|---------|------------------|----------------------------------|
| 34      | 330              | Successfully updated! 🎉         |

Your completed quantity has been updated to match the planned number. Keep up the fantastic work! 🚀

steps.sql: SELECT planned_number FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id = 34;
steps.description: Retrieve the planned number for the sewing task with ID 34

steps.sql: UPDATE sewing_tasks SET completed_number = (SELECT planned_number FROM (SELECT planned_number FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id = 34) AS temp) WHERE id = 34;
steps.description: Update the completed number for the sewing task with ID 34 to match the planned number
